channel.title: Curser (Neutral Killing), Spy (BD Investigator), Eavesdropper (BR Investigator)
channel.description:
## [color=#FA6B00]Curser[/color] ----------
**Faction:** Neutral **Type:** Killing
**Passive Ability 1:** Driven You are immune to being occupied at night **Passive Ability 2:** Bring Them Down When you die you will also kill all your cursed targets
**Night Ability 1:** Hex Curse your target (infinite) **Night Ability 2:** Channel Energy Kill all your cursed targets (infinite)
## [color=00A4C1]Spy[/color] ----------
**Faction:** Blue Dragon **Type:** Investigator
**Day Ability 1:** Analyse Determine your target's type (infinite)
**Night Ability 1:** Snoop Around Find out who left their chambers that night (3) **Night Ability 2:** Compare Compare your target from the day with your night target, revealing whether they are in the same faction
**BR Counterpart: [color=#7B00C1]Eavesdropper[/color]** **Cult Counterpart: [color=#C10000]Seeker[/color]**
## [color=#7B00C1]Eavesdropper[/color] ----------
**Faction:** Black Rose **Type:** Investigator
**Day Ability 1:** Conclude Determine your target's class (3)
**Night Ability 1:** Lookout Find out who visited the Black Rose faction (infinite) **Night Ability 2:** Examine Determine whether your target is unique (infinite)
